kingdom

Class Kingdom

      • Kingdom

        public Kingdom(javafx.scene.layout.Pane layer,
               int nbPlayers,
               int nbIA,
               int levelIA,
               int width_plateau,
               int height_plateau,
               int dist_min_castle,
               int nbCastleNeutres,
               int nbPikemen_init,
               int nbKnight_init,
               int nbOnager_init)
        Construct a Kingdom
        Parameters:
        layer - Layer in which the elements of the game will appear
        nbPlayers - Number of real players (0 or 1)
        nbIA - Number of AI
        levelIA - Level maximum of the AI
        width_plateau - Width
        height_plateau - Height
        dist_min_castle - Minimal distance between castles
        nbCastleNeutres - Number of neutral castles
        nbPikemen_init - Initial number of pikemen
        nbKnight_init - Initial number of knight
        nbOnager_init - Initial number of onager
